weapon.name: Stick
weapon.note: By the shape you can tell that it’s the humerus of a tree. This one is not particularly funny.

weapon.name: Coconut
weapon.note: The coconut nut is a giant nut and kills more people than sharks do (Warning: not a nut).

weapon.name: Very small rock
weapon.description: Multiple item loot. Throw it at the same range to make a weird noise in a 2 hex range. All minions that are facing away from the noise have a 10% chance to look behind them in the next tick, losing their actions.
weapon.note: Can also be used to make strange noises resembling a BOAR!

weapon.name: 3-Tines fork
weapon.note: A very small trident to rule the seven forking seas.

weapon.name: Throwing knife
weapon.description: Multiple item loot. You can spend 1+2+3 EP to throw up to 2 additional knives in the same tick.
weapon.note: MUDA! MUDA! MUDA! MUDA! MUDA! MUDA! MUDA! MUDA! MUDA! MUDAAAAA!

weapon.name: Boxing Gloves
weapon.description: Spend 1 EP to attack twice the same target in the same tick with Boxing Gloves. Occupy only 1 slot in the backpack.

armour.name: Cup-head helmet
armour.description: Spend 1 additional EP after jumping to do a double jump. Instead of landing in the selected destination, you can land in an adjacent hex in the next tick. If there’s an enemy near the landing location you can parry them, dealing 1 damage
armour.note: Do not deal with the Devil!

armour.name: Earplugs
armour.description: Multiple item loot. Ignore the sound damage or effects that you could suffer and reduce the hits of Earplugs by 1.
armour.note: Deaf people do not understand the effort.

armour.name: Cotton T-Shirt
armour.description: With a 1 tick action T-pose in front of a minion for a 50% chance to stun them in the next tick. Discard Cotton T-Shirt if the action was successful.

armour.name: Oven mittens
armour.description: Oven mittens absorb 1 additional fire damage. Oven mittens occupy only 1 slot in the backpack

armour.name: Fashionable cloak
armour.description: Fashionable cloak absorbs 1 additional damage from ranged attacks.

armour.name: Cool shades
armour.description: If you can come up with a witty pun when an enemy is defeated, gain 5 XP and discard Cool Shades.

armour.name: Bowler hat
armour.description: When you loot, if it’s a multiple item loot of rarity uncommon or common, loot 1 more and eat Bowler hat to heal 1 HP.
armour.note: I say good sir, this investment turned out quite profitable!

armour.name: Senility
armour.description: Transfigure yourself in an innocent old man for the duration of 5 ticks. You can only move awkwardly in these conditions. Minions always ignore old men.
armour.note: I’m an old man. I’m an old human!

spell.name: Tele Chinesis
spell.description: Moves an item in a 3 hexes radius by up to 3 hexes or move a character by 1 hex

spell.name: Magical spitball
spell.note: A magical projectile that is cast through a hollowed out pen. Possibly not magical and… ew stop that!

spell.name: Wingardium Heliosà
spell.description: Make the target fly for 3 ticks. Additionally make their voices high-pitched.

spell.name: Aurora borealis
spell.description: Magical flames start dancing over the head of the target dealing 2 fire damage.

spell.name: Intimidating appearance
spell.description: Your face turns terribly twisted with anger: minions in a 2 hexes radius area have a 20% chance to run away as fast as possible for the duration of 3 ticks.
spell.note: Prepare to meet Mr angry eyes!

misc.name: Out of tune bell
misc.description: You can consume 1 use to perform a melee attack with a 1 tick action, dealing 1 damage. It counts as an instrument for a Bard.
misc.note: Hope the toss of your coin doesn’t lead you to madness.

misc.name: Shabby harp
misc.description: It counts as an instrument for a Bard.
misc.note: Warning: find something better to put an infernal hound to sleep.

misc.name: Cute little cactus
misc.note: Did you ask for a fiery sword?

misc.name: Cute bandaid
misc.description: Heal an adjacent target for 1 HP. Spend an additional tick to kiss the wound and heal 1 additional HP.
misc.note: Kiss the wound cause saliva has antimicrobial properties.

misc.name: Cup of Tea
misc.description: Heal for 1 HP. If you also have Scones you can call for tea time. Everyone stops what they’re doing and restores 2 HP, MP and EP. Tea can only be consumed when the ticker ends in 5.
misc.note: There’s always time for a cup of tea!

misc.name: Scones
misc.description: Heal for 1 HP. If you also have Cup of tea you can call for tea time. Everyone stops what they’re doing and restores 2 HP, MP and EP. Scones can only be consumed when the ticker ends in 5.
misc.note: Delicious scones with jam and clotted cream.

misc.name: Cheese
misc.description: Throw it for 1 damage up to 3 hexes away or eat it to restore 1 HP. Additionally, after 30 ticks Cheese ages and restores 3 additional HP or deals 3 more damage.

role_change.name: Legolas, what do your elf-eyes see?
role_change.note: Same as yours! What the fork do you think they see?

role_change.name: Well hello my name is Sona
Everybody panic!
role_change.description: You must shuffle all your team’ roles NOW!
role_change.note: I am Abaddon the destroyer and I will be your support today!
